perk.maniacrev.berserker.name: Berserker
perk.maniacrev.berserker.desc: Passive: Strength I. Active: Regeneration depends on nearby allies.
perk.maniacrev.vampire.name: Vampire
perk.maniacrev.speedster.name: Speedster
perk.maniacrev.fortress.name: Fortress
perk.maniacrev.scout.name: Scout
perk.maniacrev.scout.desc: Activation: night vision and speed for 10 seconds.
perk.maniacrev.mimic.name: Mimic
perk.maniacrev.mimic.desc: Transforms into the most common block nearby for 7 seconds.
perk.maniacrev.medic.name: Medic
perk.maniacrev.medic.desc: Passive: regeneration. Active: heals all allies within 5 blocks.
perk.maniacrev.trapper_survivor.name: Trapper
perk.maniacrev.trapper_survivor.desc: Places cobwebs to slow down the maniac.
perk.maniacrev.hacker.name: Hacker
perk.maniacrev.decoy.name: Decoy
perk.maniacrev.decoy.desc: Creates distracting noise and particles elsewhere.
perk.maniacrev.predator.name: Predator
perk.maniacrev.predator.desc: Highlights the nearest survivor and grants speed.
perk.maniacrev.terror.name: Terror
perk.maniacrev.terror.desc: Passive: weakness to nearby survivors. Active: scream of terror - blindness to enemies.
perk.maniacrev.trapper_maniac.name: Trapper
perk.maniacrev.executioner.name: Executioner
perk.maniacrev.executioner.desc: Execution mode: massive damage, but slowed. Only in Reversal!
perk.maniacrev.shadow.name: Shadow

shop.maniacrev.skin_shadow.name: Shadow Skin

shop.maniacrev.particles_smoke.name: Particles: Smoke
shop.maniacrev.reveal_maniac_class.name: Intel: Maniac
shop.maniacrev.reveal_maniac_class.desc: Learn the maniac's class at the start of the game
shop.maniacrev.reveal_survivor_count.des: Learn the number of survivors at the start of the game
shop.maniacrev.extra_preset_slot.name: Extra Preset Slot
shop.maniacrev.extra_preset_slot.desc: Adds +1 slot for saved perk sets
cosmetic.maniacrev.particles_flame.name: Particles: Flame
cosmetic.maniacrev.particles_hearts.name: Particles: Hearts
cosmetic.maniacrev.particles_smoke.name: Particles: Smoke
cosmetic.maniacrev.bleeding_axe.name: Bleeding (Axe)
cosmetic.maniacrev.bleeding_axe.desc: Red trail when striking with an axe
cosmetic.maniacrev.halo.name: Roulette
cosmetic.maniacrev.frost_sword.name: Frost (Sword)
cosmetic.maniacrev.frost_sword.desc: Ice trail when striking with a sword
cosmetic.maniacrev.shadow_blade.name: Shadow (Weapon)
cosmetic.maniacrev.shadow_blade.desc: Dark trail when striking with any weapon
cosmetic.maniacrev.trail_fire.name: Trail: Fire
cosmetic.maniacrev.trail_soul.name: Trail: Souls
perk.maniacrev.bigmoney.name: Big Money Big Balls
perk.maniacrev.bigmoney.desc: Receive 20% more coins at the end of the game
perk.maniacrev.megamind.name: Megamind
perk.maniacrev.megamind.desc: Receive 20% more experience at the end of the game
perk.maniacrev.gto_medal.name: Golden GTO Medal
perk.maniacrev.gto_medal.desc: Powerful dash forward: launches 1 block up and 4 blocks forward
perk.maniacrev.fear_wave.name: Fear Wave
perk.maniacrev.fear_wave.desc: Release a wave of fear in a 5-block radius that scares EVERYONE, even allies, for a short time
perk.maniacrev.str_perk.name: Strength of the Volga
perk.maniacrev.str_perk.desc: Heed the power of the earth!
perk.maniacrev.wallhack.name: Wall Vision
perk.maniacrev.wallhack.desc: Highlights maniacs through walls for 5 seconds. Range: 15 blocks
perk.maniacrev.last_breath.name: Last Breath
perk.maniacrev.last_breath.desc: Upon death, highlights your killer for the entire team for 7 seconds
perk.maniacrev.quick_reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
perk.maniacrev.quick_reflexes.desc: Generator QTE: +0.25 sec time and +10% space for success
perk.maniacrev.blindness.name: Blindness
perk.maniacrev.blindness.desc: Passive: blindness to maniacs within 2 blocks (1 sec). Active: blindness to all maniacs on the map (10 sec, CD 120 sec)
perk.maniacrev.bloodflow.name: Rending Strike
perk.maniacrev.bloodflow.desc: Next strike tears the victim's flesh, causing them to bleed.
perk.maniacrev.i_am_speed.name: I Am Speed
perk.maniacrev.i_am_speed.desc: After killing a survivor, you gain a surge of energy and move faster
perk.maniacrev.catch_mistakes.name: Caught Red-Handed
perk.maniacrev.catch_mistakes.desc: If a player fails the reaction check, that survivor is highlighted
perk.maniacrev.computer_breaker.name: Computer Breaker
perk.maniacrev.computer_breaker.desc: Decreases hacking progress on the unhacked computer with the most progress
perk.maniacrev.highlight.name: Don't Bullshit Me Tony
perk.maniacrev.highlight.desc: Highlights a random survivor when hacking a computer
